full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA CHEN PO LAS BYUNG BA'I BRDA BKROL NYER MKHO BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @043A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RIG GNAS LA RNAM DPYOD KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA P'A RAN GU SHR'I T'A BLA MA LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOS SNGA PHYIR NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL ZHING, NYE CHAR BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA PHEKYA'A BLA MA'I SPRUL PA'I SKU DPON SLOB RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG SKAL BZANG DPAL BZANG PO SOGS KYIS KYANG BSKUL MA MDZAD PAR BRTEN, SNYOMS LAS PA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BKOD PA'O,,) ,,SVASTI, TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA JO NANG PE SE'I SHOG ,DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS, , CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,LEGS BYAS 'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR RTEN BRGYUD DE, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, , SMIN GROL LAM BZANG MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,
author_simple: DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
